tool.name: Plot Time Series
tool.help:
.. class:: infomark
**TIP:** If your data is not TAB delimited, use *Text Manipulation->Convert*
-----
This tool plots the time series in a png image or in a PDF document.
**Example**
- Input file must be tabular and well structured (each row is a time series and his values are separated by tabs, there's no header)
- Sample output:
.. image:: static/images/time_series_plot.png
